updates.title: 2nd Annual /mjg/ Quesionnaire Analysis
updates.description: The results are here! Enjoy yet another year of kurwa talking about tourneys, irc and all the hot topics you can think off FOR TWO HOURS. Text Based form, if you want to read it instead.

updates.title: WWYD league spreadsheet
updates.description: Answer wwyd and get points, sponsored by gay bandits.

updates.title: 2nd Annual /mjg/ questionnarie
updates.description: If you have spare 20 minutes, please fill it up. You don't have to answer all of the question (although it would be much appreciated). The form will be active for around one week. I'll make a reminder in the thread one day before closing it, and then it will take me few days to compile the results and release them in video and text form.

updates.title: Friendly Match Plus mod
updates.description: Adds UI for extra room creation parameters. Most of seem to work. Might be ban-worthy? Use at your risk.

updates.title: Decensor mod
updates.description: Read all the bad words like "tenhou" or "tiananmen" and avoid the chink censorship.

updates.title: Fantasy /mjg/ league
updates.description: Make your team here. Pick your favourite >NAMES and fight it out.

updates.title: Buttons mod
updates.description: Replaces 'Riichi', 'Ron' and 'Tsumo' prompts with 'Free Sex', 'Rekt' and 'Skill' respectively. Updated again.

updates.title: Akochan Reviewer Batch File
updates.description: The latest version of Akochan Reviewer with a batch file all ready to go so you can try it out. Just run the review.bat and paste in your log then it will output a webpage with your reviewed game.

updates.title: 2nd /mjg/ Great Annual Questionnaire

updates.description: If you have any feedback (x rule was shit, x thing was great) or ideas tell me in the this form.

updates.title: Playing Mahjong with Dignity by Kosho Tsuchida-Pro
updates.description: Tsuchida Kosho-pro held a two-hour lecture for English-language players, held online on Zoom, translated live in subtitles. He chose to speak about two topics dear to him: chiitoitsu, and "paipinkao" - playing mahjong with dignity.

updates.title: Catfood Bowl 2 /mjg/ Commentary
updates.description: Watch our /mjg/ reps fight against the rigging of the catfood official 2nd tourney, from the perspective of /mjg/ and not those faggots from the official stream.

updates.description: Use the log viewer to send messages and friend requests to unsuspecting anons. A bit creepy if you ask me.
